name: Espadrilles Clog Mules for Women Comfortable Slip On Mule Flats Shoes
product_description: Design Concept Elevate your casual and dressy style with these chic close toe platform flats for women, blending timeless charm and effortless comfort. Crafted with premium faux suede uppers and a classic closed round toe silhouette, these Espadrilles Flatform Mules feature a lustrous gold horsebit detail for a touch of refined glamour. The versatile flat design ensures all-day comfort, while the slip-on construction delivers convenience for on-the-go moments. Perfect as dressy shoes for women or casual footwear, these modern braid mules sandals for women redefine laid-back elegance. Espadrilles Flatform Mules for Women Construction Specifications Heel Type: Flat Style: Round toe canvas sandal for women with open-back and gold horsebit detail (Slip On Comfortable Flat Clogs Shoes design) Upper: Soft Faux Suede Closure: Slip-on for easy on/off (open-back design) Fit: True to size; recommended for standard width. Occasions: Ideal for casual outings, dressy-casual events, daily wear, and summer days COLORS and HEEL HEIGHT : Please note that colors may vary slightly according to monitor settings. The heel height shall slightly float up and down by different size, please refer to the actual product.
